title: Mr Sabri Boukadoum on visit to Libya Monday
text: Minister of Foreign Affairs, Mr Sabri Boukadoum, is making today a working visit to sister country Libya, accompanied by the minister of the Interior, Local Authorities and National Planning, Mr Kamel Beldjoud, together with a high-level delegation.

Leading a delegation, Mr Boukadoum will meet top officials of the new Libyan executive authority at the presidential council, the government of national union and the High Council of State, to examine bilateral relations at all levels and the prospects for a political settlement of the Libyan crisis.The visit is part of the efforts made to promote relations between the two brother countries, Algeria and Libya, and support the Libyan parties to face the current challenges, including the implementation of the roadmap to ensure a peaceful and inclusive solution to the crisis.
